H0.text: What is the US state capital of Idaho. Coeur d'Alene

H1.text: What is the US state capital of Idaho. Idaho Falls

H2.text: What is the US state capital of Idaho. Pocatello

H3.text: What is the US state capital of Idaho. Boise

A4.text: Boise is the capital and most populous city of the U.S. state of Idaho.

A5.text: All of these rejected efforts to incorporate the city came after Boise had been controversially made the state capital in 1864 over strong opposition from northern Idaho interests.
